modPigmentDyeCornflower: A beautiful cornflower. Can be used to create pigment.
modPigmentDyeCornflowerSeeds: Cornflower seeds. Plant them and make more cornflowers to harvest.
modPigmentDyeRose: A beautiful rose. Can be used to create pigment.
modPigmentDyeRoseSeeds: Rose seeds. Plant them and make more roses to harvest.
modPigmentDyeSunflower: A beautiful sunflower. Can be used to create pigment.
modPigmentDyeSunflowerSeeds: Sunflower seeds. Plant them and make more sunflowers to harvest.
modPigmentDyeRedPigment: Red pigment created from a rose.
modPigmentDyeRedDye: Red dye to be used with a paintbrush.
modPigmentDyeStoneBowl: A bowl used to hold any dyes created.
modPigmentDyePaintbrush: A paintbrush that can be used to apply dye.

modPigmentDyeRedPigmentIngredientGroup: Pigments of red color. Perhaps you can mix it with another color...
modPigmentDyeYellowPigmentIngredientGrou: Pigments of yellow color. Perhaps you can mix it with another color...
modPigmentDyeBluePigmentIngredientGroup: Pigments of blue color. Perhaps you can mix it with another color...
